photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

hotel.title: Hotel
hotel.description: A hotel property listed on the platform.

id.description: The unique ID of the hotel.

streetAddress.description: The street address of the hotel.

city.description: The city where the hotel is located.

price.description: The price per night of the hotel.

rating.description: The rating of the hotel (out of 5).

amenities.description: The list of amenities offered by the hotel.

description.description: A short description of the hotel.

imageUrls.description: A list of URLs for the hotel's photos.

latitude.description: The latitude of the hotel's location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the hotel's location.

managerName.description: The name of the hotel manager.

contactEmail.description: The contact email address for the hotel.

contactPhone.description: The contact phone number for the hotel.

taxRate.description: The tax rate percentage for the hotel.

commissionRate.description: The commission rate percentage for the hotel.

favoriteHotel.title: Favorite Hotel Reference
favoriteHotel.description: A reference to a hotel that a user has saved as a favorite.

hotelId.description: The ID of the favorited hotel document in the /hotels collection.

booking.title: Booking
booking.description: A record of a hotel booking made by a user.

bookingId.description: The unique 7-character ID for the booking, starting with 'Sty'.

hotelId.description: The ID of the booked hotel.

hotelName.description: The name of the booked hotel.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the booking.

userName.description: The name of the user who made the booking.

userEmail.description: The email of the user who made the booking.

totalPrice.description: The total price of the booking.

bookedAt.description: The timestamp when the booking was made.

roomAvailability.title: Room Availability
roomAvailability.description: Defines the pricing and number of available rooms for a specific date.

date.description: The specific date for this availability entry (YYYY-MM-DD).

price.description: The price for a room on this specific date.

roomsAvailable.description: The number of rooms available for booking on this date.

review.title: Review
review.description: A review of a hotel by a user.

/hotels/{hotelId}.description: A list of all hotel properties.

/hotels/{hotelId}/availability/{availabi.description: Availability and pricing information for a specific hotel on a specific date.

/hotels/{hotelId}/reviews/{reviewId}.description: A list of all reviews for a specific hotel.

/users/{userId}/favorites/{favoriteId}.description: A user's list of favorite hotel references.

/bookings/{bookingId}.description: A collection of all bookings made on the platform.
